steps: 1. Remove the solid sample from the crucible carefully.
2. Use a diamond saw to trim the sample to the desired dimensions (3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches).
3. Sand the edges and surfaces using progressively finer grits (120, 220, 400) to achieve a smooth finish.
4. Clean the surface with isopropyl alcohol to remove any dust or residue before final use.
